text: Scut or SCUT may refer to: * Scut, a short tail on various mammals * Scutwork, menial work * Adam Scut (fl. 1382–1401), English politician * Scut Farkus, a fictional character in the film A Christmas Story * South China University of Technology (pinyin: Huánán Lǐgōng Dàxué), a public university in Guangzhou, China ==See also== * Scute or scutum, a bony plate or scale overlaid with horn, on animals
title: Scut (disambiguation)
